entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
